Sniper


Sniper is walking to scan for any more maximals when he hears gun 
fire. "computer, where does the gun fire come from?"

Computer:Out side

"auto guns on." Sniper pulls up his com link. "Prowl, There is a
fight 
outside. What do you suggest I do?"
